OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard for security on fund withdrawals. Each group has a creator who can manage goals and members. Members can contribute to goals and pay their shares of bills. Goals have deadlines and target amounts; funds can be withdrawn by the creator once the target is met or the deadline has passed. Bills can be created by any member, and members pay their equal shares. Bill creators can withdraw funds once fully paid.","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"withdrawGoalFunds(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Creator can withdraw if target met OR deadline passed. withdrawGoalFunds(uint256,uint256).details: Creator can withdraw if target met OR deadline passed. Consider refund logic if target not met.

CreateBill(uint256,string,uint256).notice: Create a bill for the group (any member can create)

CreateGoal(uint256,string,uint256,uint25.notice: Create a saving goal (only group creator)

CreateGroup(string).notice: Create a new group; caller becomes creator and initial member

LeaveGroup(uint256).notice: Leave a group; caller is removed from member list

addMember(uint256,address[]).notice: Add members to a group (only group creator)

getAllBills(uint256).notice: Return basic info about all bills in a group

getAllGoals(uint256).notice: Return basic info about all goals in a group

getBillPayers(uint256,uint256).notice: Get bill payers and their paid amounts

getContribution(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Read how much an address contributed to a goal

getGoalContributors(uint256,uint256).notice: Get contributors and their amounts for a goal

getGroup(uint256).notice: Get basic group info (name, creator, members)

getOutstandingAmount(uint256,uint256,add.notice: Get outstanding amount for a group member on a bill

getPaidShare(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Read how much an address paid toward a bill

isMemberOf(uint256,address).notice: Check if an address is a member of a group

payBillShare(uint256,uint256).notice: Pay toward a bill share. Caller must not be a member and sends ETH

transferCreator(uint256,address).notice: Transfer creator role to another address

withdrawBillFunds(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw collected bill funds (only bill creator) once fully paid

withdrawGoalFunds(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw goal funds (only creator). Uses nonReentrant.
